title: SSX Trilogy (SSX2,3 and 4) HD Repack for PC - Install and play
description:
SSX Trilogy (SSX Tricky, 3, & On Tour) Remastered in HD for PC - Install and play.

The pinnacle of arcade stunt snowboarding and skiing finally arrives on your PC and they have never looked better!  With modern graphics mods like SweetFX, Enb, Real time texture upscaling, they rival anything released this year in the graphics department.

This setup package will install 3 full SSX games on your computer.  SSX Tricky, SSX 3, and SSX On Tour.  Each game comes installed with an exe to launch the game like any other PC game.    

I have preconfigured each game with the most compatible version of Dolphin, and the most compatible settings.  Dolphin Emulator supports all the latest in Graphical mods and features, but getting it all working can be complicated.  The games are rendered at much higher resolutions, at faster framerates, with more graphics features than they ever enjoyed on their respective consoles. 

Each game install folder contains a Dolphin.exe file in case you do want to make changes, but it's certainly not required.  Otherwise you probably won't even notice the games are running in an emulation layer.

Check out my other console/emu prepacks at https://thepiratebay.mn/user/formfactor
